017package org.apache.bcel.generic;
018
019import org.apache.bcel.ExceptionConst;
020
021/**
022 * ANEWARRAY - Create new array of references
023 *
024 * <PRE>
025 * Stack: ..., count -&gt; ..., arrayref
026 * </PRE>
027 */
028public class ANEWARRAY extends CPInstruction implements LoadClass, AllocationInstruction, ExceptionThrower, StackConsumer, StackProducer {
029
030    /**
031     * Empty constructor needed for Instruction.readInstruction. Not to be used otherwise.
032     */
033    ANEWARRAY() {
034    }
035
036    public ANEWARRAY(final int index) {
037        super(org.apache.bcel.Const.ANEWARRAY, index);
038    }
039
040    /**
041     * Call corresponding visitor method(s). The order is: Call visitor methods of implemented interfaces first, then call
042     * methods according to the class hierarchy in descending order, i.e., the most specific visitXXX() call comes last.
043     *
044     * @param v Visitor object
045     */
046    @Override
047    public void accept(final Visitor v) {
048        v.visitLoadClass(this);
049        v.visitAllocationInstruction(this);
050        v.visitExceptionThrower(this);
051        v.visitStackProducer(this);
052        v.visitTypedInstruction(this);
053        v.visitCPInstruction(this);
054        v.visitANEWARRAY(this);
055    }
056
057    @Override
058    public Class<?>[] getExceptions() {
059        return ExceptionConst.createExceptions(ExceptionConst.EXCS.EXCS_CLASS_AND_INTERFACE_RESOLUTION, ExceptionConst.NEGATIVE_ARRAY_SIZE_EXCEPTION);
060    }
061
062    @Override
063    public ObjectType getLoadClassType(final ConstantPoolGen cpg) {
064        Type t = getType(cpg);
065        if (t instanceof ArrayType) {
066            t = ((ArrayType) t).getBasicType();
067        }
068        return t instanceof ObjectType ? (ObjectType) t : null;
069    }
070}
